description: This table contains hospital guarantor payment plan information.

columns.name: GUAR_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the guarantor account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PP_START_DATE
columns.description: The Hospital Billing payment plan start date.

columns.name: PP_INIT_BAL
columns.description: Hospital Billing Payment plan initial balance

columns.name: PP_AMT
columns.description: Hospital Billing Payment plan monthly payment amount

columns.name: PP_NUM_PMTS
columns.description: Hospital Billing Payment plan number of payments

columns.name: PP_EFF_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the payment plan was set up (UTC).

columns.name: PP_TERMS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The term type (monthly amount or number of payments) the payment plan was created with.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Monthly Amount


Number of Payments

columns.name: PP_ORIG_PLAN_LINE
columns.description: Holds the original plan line in the related group if the current line is an update. If the current line is a new plan, the item is null.

columns.name: PP_STMT_DAY_OF_MO
columns.description: Stores the day of month to process statements for a payment plan with Auto Pay.

columns.name: CARD_ID
columns.description: Stores the payment method ID for Hospital Billing payment plans on Auto Pay

columns.name: PP_APAY_DAY_OF_MO
columns.description: Stores the day of month to charge the payment method on file and post a payment on the guarantor. This item forces statement cycle for monthly drop cycle.

columns.name: PP_CREATE_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the user in Epic who set up this payment plan. If this item is populated, then the system knows this plan was set up by a user via Hyperspace.

columns.name: PP_CREATE_MYPT_ID
columns.description: Stores the MyChart user who set up this payment plan. If this item is populated, then the system knows this plan was set up by a guarantor via MyChart rather than through customer service in Hyperspace.

columns.name: PP_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the source workflow that set up this payment plan.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Hyperspace


MyChart Web


MyChart Mobile


SBO Conversion


Import Utility


Welcome


System Action


Advance Bill

columns.name: PP_INIT_DUE_AMT
columns.description: Stores the payment plan due amount for the guarantor after the plan is setup.
